title: Moonlight (Early Draft)
description:
DISCLAIMER: Before reading, please be aware that this is the very early stages of the manga, so everything is subject to change. By reading this you will have to suffer through very on-the-nose dialogue and rough possibly janky compositions. These will be fixed in the editing stages. If you are fine with that, let me tell you about this series!

Moonlight is a fun Slice-Of-Life manga about ghoul hunting and random hijinks among this Dynamic Duo! The concept for this series was "What do these two characters do in their spare time outside of work?" the answer "ghost hunting" to make it less on the nose we renamed it "Ghoul Hunting". 

You will meet a colorful cast of ladies in this series that will tie into the larger universe that is known as "Muscle+Mass", so characters introduced from the other line of stories will make an appearance here from time to time. 

Genre: Slice-of-Life, Comedy, Supernatural Thriller

For more information about this world or the cast of characters feel free to hit me up on Twitter! 
https://twitter.com/ericmartinDOOD

If you would like to support my efforts in creating this series and others, please feel free to send a tip my way at my ko-fi!
https://ko-fi.com/ericmartindood

If you would like to be a "Producer" and help in funding any manga I'm currently working on, join here!
https://ko-fi.com/ericmartindood/tiers
author: ericmartinDOOD
